mapper.select: select m.id, m.parent_id, m.name, m.url, m.perms, m.type, m.icon, m.sorted from tb_sys_user_role ur LEFT JOIN tb_sys_role_menu rm ON ur.role_id = rm.role_id LEFT JOIN tb_sys_menu m ON rm.menu_id = m.id where ur.user_id = #{userId} ORDER BY m.sorted ASC
select m.perms from tb_sys_user_role ur LEFT JOIN tb_sys_role_menu rm ON ur.role_id = rm.role_id LEFT JOIN tb_sys_menu m ON rm.menu_id = m.id where ur.user_id = #{userId}
